summary: Fix incorrect flag --output to --mode for tokmd context in documentation

receipts.command: sed -i 's/--output bundle/--mode bundle/g' README.md docs/reference-cli.md docs/recipes.md docs/tutorial.md docs/troubleshooting.md crates/tokmd/README.md
sed -i 's/--output list/--mode list/g' README.md docs/reference-cli.md docs/recipes.md docs/tutorial.md docs/troubleshooting.md crates/tokmd/README.md
